title: Our NEW Special Breaks Brochure is now available to download and pick up from one of our hotels.
content:
Our latest Special Breaks Brochure has just been released. With 18 special offers for you to enjoy in the Lakes from 1st November 2015 till 31st October 2016. From £92 per person* for a 2 night break this brochure will give you a wide choice of options. 
 

 
Whether you’re looking for a hotel in a picturesque town centre or stunning lakeside location you’ll find a break to suit you. Download Lake District Hotels Special Breaks Brochure now. 
 

 
Special Breaks Brochure Front Cover 
 
*Price based on a stay at the Kings Arms Hotel
